/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11 -g -O0 -g   CMakeFiles/example.dir/src/robot_model.cpp.o CMakeFiles/example.dir/src/control_model.cpp.o CMakeFiles/example.dir/src/serial_listen_thread.cpp.o CMakeFiles/example.dir/src/main.cpp.o  -o example libBase/libBase.a libHardWare/serialPort/libSerialPort.a libHardWare/usbCapture/libUsbCapture.a libLinuxHelper.a -lpthread libDetection/libDetection.a libPid/libPid.a osdk-core/libdjiosdk-core.a /usr/local/opencv-3.1.0/lib/libopencv_viz.so.3.1.0 /usr/local/opencv-3.1.0/lib/libopencv_videostab.so.3.1.0 /usr/local/opencv-3.1.0/lib/libopencv_superres.so.3.1.0 /usr/local/opencv-3.1.0/lib/libopencv_stitching.so.3.1.0 /usr/local/opencv-3.1.0/lib/libopencv_shape.so.3.1.0 /usr/local/opencv-3.1.0/lib/libopencv_photo.so.3.1.0 /usr/local/opencv-3.1.0/lib/libopencv_objdetect.so.3.1.0 /usr/local/opencv-3.1.0/lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.3.1.0 -lrealsense2 -lpthread libBase/libBase.a /usr/local/opencv-3.1.0/lib/libopencv_video.so.3.1.0 /usr/local/opencv-3.1.0/lib/libopencv_features2d.so.3.1.0 /usr/local/opencv-3.1.0/lib/libopencv_ml.so.3.1.0 /usr/local/opencv-3.1.0/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.3.1.0 /usr/local/opencv-3.1.0/lib/libopencv_videoio.so.3.1.0 /usr/local/opencv-3.1.0/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs.so.3.1.0 /usr/local/opencv-3.1.0/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.3.1.0 /usr/local/opencv-3.1.0/lib/libopencv_flann.so.3.1.0 /usr/local/opencv-3.1.0/lib/libopencv_core.so.3.1.0 -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/opencv-3.1.0/lib
